item.description:
Thanks to John K who reminded me about this restaurant, we are scheduling an event at Ginza! I missed the last time we ate here and have heard only good things about it. Check out their website http://www.ginzacuisi.... The prices are right and I am always in the mood to enjoy some sushi!
I have a feeling that this event might fill up so please be mindful of your RSVPs. Try to bring cash since this helps when settling the bill.

The reservation is under Kelly and we will be sitting at the hibatchi table! Yeah!
organizer ~ Kelly

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Ginza in Bloomfield
